description: A shell script used for managing router configurations, including interface setup, hostapd management, DHCP configuration, network bridging, and web server control.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts 2.4 GHz hostapd service by bringing interfaces down and up, and killing existing hostapd processes.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Restarts 5 GHz hostapd service by removing and reloading driver modules, then starting hostapd with configuration.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Restarts the primary hostapd service, similar to Restart_Hostapd.
